

===========
crust.setupCrust
===========

.. currentmodule:: nucleardatapy.crust.setupCrust

Here are a set of figures which are produced with the Python sample: /nucleardatapy_sample/crust_setupCrust_plot.py

	:width: 70 %
	:alt: map to buried treasure

	Properties of the crust as given by the models available in the nuda toolkit.
